thread.title: Room 15 =Spacious, own outdoor entrance through courtyard
thread.title_full: Room 15 =Spacious, own outdoor entrance through courtyard - Review of Millesime Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: wondertraveler40
title: Room 15 =Spacious, own outdoor entrance through courtyard
text: We only stayed here one night as we came back from London but wish I booked this hotel the prior week we were in Paris. Room was large in comparison to standard Rooms you find in Europe. I liked we had our own entrance through an interior courtyard and a traditional key. You can walk to Norte Dame or even the Louvre. When I come back to Paris I will book here.
